channel.title: LLM on Tools for Academic Research
channel.description: Recent content in LLM on Tools for Academic Research

item.title: Scite Assistant
item.description: Assistant is a conversational tool made by scite that lets you ask questions in simple language and get answers backed by real, up to date references. Think of like ChatGPT with real, up to date references, tailor-made for anyone discovering, understanding, or writing research.

item.title: Prompt Engineering Guide
item.description: Guides on prompt engineering to get the best out of the Large Language Models.

item.title: A.R.I.A. (Aria)
item.description: Aria is Your AI Research Assistant Powered by Large Language Models

item.title: ChatGPT
item.description: A model called ChatGPT which interacts in a conversational way. The dialogue format makes it possible for ChatGPT to answer follow-up questions, admit its mistakes, challenge incorrect premises, and reject inappropriate requests.
